name: fnssresd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1), wfn(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfn(cres(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

comment: Restriction of a function to a subclass of its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
